scripts.dev: VITE_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) VITE_APP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) UI_PORT=8888 npm run x
scripts.x: hc s clean &&  npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run start:happ" "hc run-local-services -b $BOOTSTRAP_PORT -s $SIGNAL_PORT"
scripts.tool-devy: concurrently "npm start -w ui" "sleep 1 && weave --agent-idx 1 --dev-config we_dev/config.ts" "sleep 10 && weave --agent-idx 2 --dev-config we_dev/config.ts"
scripts.tool-devx: BPORT=46263 SPORT=46262; concurrently "hc run-local-services -b $BPORT -s $SPORT" "npm start -w ui" "./we_dev/we.AppImage  --dev-config we_dev/config.json --agent-num 1 -b http://127.0.0.1:$BPORT -s ws://127.0.0.1:$SPORT" "sleep 10 && ./we_dev/we.AppImage --dev-config we_dev/config.json --agent-num 2 -b http://127.0.0.1:$BPORT -s ws://127.0.0.1:$SPORT"
scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && concurrently "npm run start -w ui" "hc-spin -n 2 --ui-port $UI_PORT ./workdir/slate.webhapp"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && cargo nextest run -j 1
scripts.package: rm -rf ui/dist && rm -f ui/dist.zip && npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive && npm run weave-hash
scripts.start:happ: echo "starting with admin $VITE_ADMIN_PORT" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=$VITE_ADMIN_PORT --piped generate workdir/slate.happ --run=$VITE_APP_PORT -a slate network -b "http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT"  webrtc "ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT"
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:zomes: CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target RUSTFLAGS='--cfg getrandom_backend="custom"' cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown
scripts.launch: concurrently "npm run local-services" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/slate.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:"$SIGNAL_PORT""
scripts.test:applet: cross-env BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run local-services" "weave -c we_dev/config.ts -b http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT -s ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT "
